content: रहस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} [रह्-असुन्] {@--1@} Solitude, privacy, loneliness, retirement, secrecy; रहसि रमते <ls>Māl. 2. 2</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 3</ls>, <ls n="R.">15. 92</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 138.</ls> {@--2@} A deserted or lonely place, hiding-place. {@--3@} A secret, mystery. {@--4@} Copulation, coition. {@--5@} Truth. {@--6@} Swiftness. {@--7@} A privity. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} Secretly, clandestinely, privately, in private or secret; अतः परीक्ष्य कर्तव्यं विशेषात्संगतं रहः <ls>Ś. 5. 24</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> in <ab>comp.</ab>; वृत्तं रहःप्रणयमप्रतिपद्यमाने <ls n="Ś.">5. 23.</ls>
